data.message: Hello, our church has a page that the past secretary made. There has been some bullying by members that left with the secretary on the page directed toward the Pastor..The past secretary told me I would be able to delete it because I am an admin but I can't.  Can you help us please?

replies.message: Hi Toni. The best way to report abusive content on Facebook is by using the Report link that appears near the content you would like to report. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2dPJ28B. Thanks for reaching out. -Hannah
